items.title: At long last, the mystery of lightning on Mars is solved
bullets: • Mini-lightning strikes created by whirling dust devils on Mars have been detected accidentally by the Perseverance rover
• The chance discovery is direct evidence of a form of lightning on Mars, researchers say
• Lightning has proven more elusive on our closest planetary neighbors

• The instrument came to him through a local charity, the Olympias Music Foundation

items.title: Donald Trump pardons Texas Democrat Henry Cuellar
bullets: • President Donald Trump pardoned U.S
• Rep
• Henry Cuellar, D-Laredo, and his wife, ending their multi-year legal battle
• The president said the congressman had been punished by a weaponized Department of Justice under former president Joe Biden for speaking out against the administration’s border policy
• He also filed for reelection as a Democrat, quieting speculation that he planned to switch parties

items.title: Everything you need to know about Biden's student loan forgiveness program

• A decision is expected by late June or early July

• Harper’s Island was truly a great series and wild experience, with tons of schlock and flaws, but beautiful in its eccentricity and uniqueness, especially for a slasher

items.title: Fever helps the body fight off viruses: But how does it work?
bullets: • The nature of a fever and whether it's good or bad has been contested for centuries
• In ancient Greece, the physician Hippocrates thought that fever had useful qualities, and could cook an illness out of a patient
• Today, researchers understand that fever is part of the immune system's response to a pathogen
• But how they can help kick an infection remains mysterious
